comment.body: We have worked with Mateusz for 1,5 years on a chat application. He has implemented the backend from scratch. Mateusz is reliable, easy-going and a skilled developer with creativity. He always had good suggestions and he became part of the company. Among his best skills: engagement with the project, great communication (debugging with him is always easy-going and fun), clean code, good documentation and own initiative to bring up solutions. He is a great developer and I can only recommend him!
comment.author: Rosa Merino-Claros

comment.body: A+ honest complete and thorough work. I would highly advise that anyone in doubt of a solid developer to hire Mateusz in a heartbeat, very professional.
